Wherever possible, answers should include case studies and examples, and, where relevant, large, well drawn
maps, sketches and diagrams.

1.    (a)   Explain how and why one network (transport, internet, or communication)
            has grown over time.                                                               [10 marks]

      (b)   Examine the relative importance of the different financial flows that connect
            global core areas with peripheral areas.                                           [15 marks]


2.    (a)   Analyse the spatial and temporal pattern of adoption of one or more
            branded commodities.                                                               [10 marks]

      (b)   “Global interactions have helped reduce disparities between places.” Discuss
            this statement.                                                                    [15 marks]


3.    (a)   Explain how global interactions can foster environmental awareness.                [10 marks]

      (b)   “International interactions always result in the homogenization of culture.”
            Discuss this statement.                                                            [15 marks]
